titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States providing that no person may be elected to the House of Representatives more than three times, and providing that no person may be elected to the Senate more than once.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution.

bill.summary: 1/4/1995--Introduced. Constitutional Amendment - Prohibits any person from being elected to the House of Representatives more than three times or from being elected or appointed to the Senate more than once.
